<p><b>Outputs:</b> </p><ul><li><b>Status</b> - Will be set to &#39;Success&#39; if the request succeeds or &#39;Error&#39; if a failure occurs.</li><li><b>Error Message</b> - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.</li></ul>
<p><b>Error Messages:</b> </p><ul><li>Invalid User Name</li><li>Invalid Request</li><li>Invalid Credentials for host</li><li>User Name cannot be empty</li><li>Invalid hostname in connection or Host not reachable from Mid server</li><li>Host Credentials incorrect. Authentication Error in MID Server</li><li>Unknown Error. Please check error log for more information</li><li>The request has no process associated with it.</li><li>The user associated with request is not valid.</li><li>The process associated with request is not valid.</li><li>There are more than one credential stores defined for process.</li><li>The credential store associated with request is not valid.</li></ul>
